hits.name: Deem Amber
hits.description:
Description:

This rare and luxurious fragrance adds a charming and attractive touch with its oriental amber scent that makes you fascinates all hearts around you with confidence and a seductive look.

About the brand:

Deem trademark of Saudi Arabia is a modern brand was founded in 2015, from company has long-standing experience of more than twenty years in the world of parfumes. Featuring Deem, specialists in luxury and special parfumes that reflect the taste experience and quality in their products. All deem parfume is one of the European components of high quality and carefully selected and manufactured with the latest styles and the highest standards in the parfume industry and the world

hits.name: Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris Parfum Floral
hits.description:
Description:

With this perfume, you will feel the rush of a passionate love story. The floral fruity fragrance will hit you with the freshness of its notes, giving a hint of feminine sensuality that grabs your senses.

About the brand:

Yves Saint Laurent is one of the most influential and inspiring designers in the world. From his early days, YSL has a touch that remains unmistakable. Its style is reflected in the realm of fashion, including accessories, jewelry, ready-to-wear, fragrance, and cosmetics.
hits.ingredients: Citruses, Peach, Datura, White Rose, Peony, Jasmine Sambac, Orange Blossom, Magnolia, Patchouli, Musk, Cashmere Wood

hits.name: Loewe Solo Cedro
hits.description:
Description:

This woody spicy fragrance is designed for the authentic man who appreciates the value of balance. Its blend of mandarin, nutmeg and cedar reflects the power, sophistication and personality of a various selection of woods, which offers a different and unique scent.

About the brand:

The brand Loewe was founded by German-born Enrique Loewe Roessberg in 1846 to express his love of Spanish culture. The brand was first specialised in high-quality luggage, until its first fragrance was released in 1972, marking the start of a continued success in the world of fragrance.
hits.ingredients: Mandarin, pink pepper, Lavender, nutmeg, Cedar, benzoin

hits.name: Narciso Rodriguez Rouge
hits.description:
Description:

A woody fragrance for women, filled with temptation, mystery, and sensuality, that evokes deep emotions within you, with a stunning blend of woody amber and black and white cedarwood.

About the brand:

Narciso Rodriguez did some independent design work in New York, before becoming director of women's design for the Anne Klein brand, and later worked for Clavin Klein. In 1997 he launched his own brand with the same name, unleashed his creativity in fashion design and luxury perfumes until he became a renowned worldwide designer.
hits.ingredients: Iris flowers, Bulgarian Rose, Musk, Orange Blossom, Tuberose, Vetiver, Black and White Cedar Extract, Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Sandalwood.

hits.name: Alexandre J Oscent
hits.description:
Description:

Indulge your sense in the new seductive scent of Alexandre J Oscent! The fruity and floral undertones will invade your senses with the enticing flavours of sweet delicious notes of Raspberry, Orange Blossom, Jasmine, Patchouli, Amber, Musk, and Vanilla. For Alexandre J Oscent celebrates the feminine and satisfies her main desire.

About the brand:

Alexandre.J is a new fragrance brand, which was early created in 2012 and updated in 2020. Alexandre.J is a contemporary French designer and Iconoclastic artist, who defines himself as an” explorer” driven by the desire to explore a wide range of olfactory notes. Moreover, he makes unusual use of exceptional materials by the virtue of his unique vision of the realm of fashion and beauty.
hits.ingredients: Orange, Bergamot, Raspberry, Orange Blossom, Jasmine, Patchouli, Amber, Musk, Vanilla

hits.name: Issey Miyake L'Eau D'Issey Pour Homme Or Encens
hits.description:
Description:

Golden water meets molten rocks. A chinny fog of haze and fume. The chemical fusion of shade and light. In the bullish spice accord, Incense adds a cool sparkle to crisp Pink pepper and warm Cumin. In the wealthy floral heart, it triggers fresh, aromatic Geranium and an extreme masculine Rose core. In the drydown, it spreads a sensational mix of Amber and Patchouli with deepness and ambiguity.

About the brand:

Issey Miyake is a Japanese fashion designer known for his innovations with fabric and his use of technology to produce interesting and practical garments. He went abroad on to work for some of the most famous couturiers of the 1960s then returned to Tokyo in 1970, founded the Miyake Design Studio and began producing women's fashions. Miyake's fashions and parfumes reflect a sense of humor and make use of multi-lingual puns. The first edition was created in 1992 and the newest is from 2020.
hits.short_name: L'Eau D'Issey Pour Homme Or Encens
hits.ingredients: Rose, Cistus, Labdanum, Spices, Pink pepper, Cumin, Dark woods, Leather, Vetiver, Sandalwood, Ambered woods

hits.name: Coach Floral
hits.description:
Description:

Coach Floral is a feminine and romantic perfume that was introduced in 2018. It has a perfect blend of florals, fruits, and spices that make it perfect for any occasion, night or day. The fragrance opens with notes that will excite your senses and consist of pink peppercorn, citrus Coeur and pineapple sorbet. The heart notes are what give this perfume its name and are gardenia, rose tea and jasmine sambac. The fragrance then settles into the base notes of patchouli, musk and creamy wood. The rounded glass bottle is adorned with the emblem of the brand and a pale pink flower hangs off the neck.

About the brand:

A leading design house of modern luxury accessories and lifestyle collections, Coach has built a long-standing reputation of quality craftsmanship, defined by a free-spirited, all-American attitude. Inspired by its heritage over the past 75 years, the brand approaches design with a modern vision, reimagining luxury for today with a unique authenticity and innovation synonymous with effortless New York style.
hits.ingredients: Citruses, Pineapple, Pink Pepper,Gardenia, Jasmine Sambac, Tea Rose,Patchouli, Woody Notes, Musk

hits.name: Oscar De La Renta Bella Blanca
hits.description:
Description:

It's an Eau de Parfum that represents the natural elegance of floral, woody and musky undertones with top notes of Pear, Green Leaves, Lily-of-the-valley that will grab your attention immediately, the heart notes of Jasmine, Rose, Orange Blossom, Tuberose that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Sandalwood, White Orris, Musk which will linger on with you through out the day

About the brand:

Oscar de la Renta's first fragrance, 1977's Oscar for women, was introduced and remains a worldwide best-seller today. A series of fragrances for men and women have followed this success. Oscar de la Renta fragrances are produced in conjunction with L'Oreal.

hits.name: One Direction That Moment
hits.description:
Description:

It's an Extravagant Fruity perfume for Women that is suitable for Day occasions with a composition that begins with notes of Apple, Grapefruit, the heart notes of Violet, Jasmine that represents the essence of the perfume, and the base notes of Wood, Musk which stays with you for a long time.

About the brand:

One Direction is a pop band and a new fragrance brand. The earliest edition was created in 2013 and the newest is from 2015. The perfumer who worked on the fragrances is Sonia Constant.

hits.name: Antonio Banderas Seduction In Black
hits.description:
Description:

A warm Oriental fragrance with fresh notes of bergamot and black currant that combines with a spicy scent of coriander, cardamom, and nutmeg. This masculine fragrance adds a confidant and attractive feeling with a shiny package that completes your elegance.

About the brand:

Antonio Alessandria was born in Catania in 1971 and grew up with his fashion-loving mother and his brilliant sister in music and he knew from a young age that he was passionate about parfumes until he studied that science with all his details in Italy and Paris and soon finished studying until he opened his first store in 2005 and produced a set of luxury parfumes Now sold in a wide range of markets around the world

hits.name: Aramis Aramis 900
hits.description:
Description:

Woody accords come out in full force with Aramis 900 cologne. This fragrance launched in 1973, and it has been a signature aroma for many men since. It opens with a strong kick with notes of lemon, Brazilian rosewood, bergamot, green notes, and coriander. The core brings geranium, rose, lily of the valley, jasmine, orris root, and carnation into the scent profile. The aromas of vetiver, oakmoss, civet, patchouli, amber, and sandalwood make up the base. Aimed to give a classical and timeless aroma, Aramis 900 is perfect for the modern-day traditional man.

About the brand:

As the first prestige men's fragrance to be sold in department stores, Aramis continues to be a defining pillar of The Estée Lauder Companies as an industry leader in the men’s fragrance and grooming category. Throughout its journey, the brand has maintained its equity, global brand ranking and classic appeal, developing a fragrance and grooming selection of products that embody classic masculinity and transcendent sophistication.
hits.ingredients: Coriander Seeds, Green Notes, Brazilian Rosewood, Bergamot, Lemon,Carnation, Orris Root, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley, Rose, Geramium,Sandalwood, Amber, Patchouli, Civet, Oakmoss, Vetiver

hits.name: Aramis Tuscany Peruomo
hits.description:
Description:

Tuscany Cologne by Aramis, A classic cologne launched in 1984, Tuscany is a fresh and spicy Fougere fragrance with a zest that’s easy to indulge in. The top notes are lavender, lemon, lime, and bergamot. As the cologne settles and the top notes evaporate, the vivid blend in the heart arises; anise and carraway spices combined with the sweet green scent of tarragon and orange blossom. The woodsy base of the fragrance features the classic combination of tonka bean and oakmoss, joined by basil, patchouli, sandalwood, cinnamon, and leather. Fashionable and masculine, this cologne works just as well in the office as it does at social events.

About the brand:

As the first prestige men's fragrance to be sold in department stores, Aramis continues to be a defining pillar of The Estée Lauder Companies as an industry leader in the men’s fragrance and grooming category. Throughout its journey, the brand has maintained its equity, global brand ranking and classic appeal, developing a fragrance and grooming selection of products that embody classic masculinity and transcendent sophistication.
hits.ingredients: Lime, Lavender, Bergamot, Lemon,Caraway, Orange Blossom, Tarragon, Anise,Leather, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Patchouli, Cinnamon, Basil, Oakmoss

hits.name: Aramis Black
hits.description:
Description:

Aramis Black Cologne by Aramis, Launched in 2015, Aramis Black is a sophisticated and elegant yet fresh scent for men. Base notes of leather, incense, vetiver and tonka bean create a masculine undertone that blends perfectly with the woody middle notes of juniper, cedar, and cognac. Top notes of grapefruit, elemi, and mastic add a clean scent. This aromatic fragrance is a heavy scent that is perfect for long nights out on the town. A very masculine scent filled with very manly notes you will fall in love with at first sniff.

About the brand:

As the first prestige men's fragrance to be sold in department stores, Aramis continues to be a defining pillar of The Estée Lauder Companies as an industry leader in the men’s fragrance and grooming category. Throughout its journey, the brand has maintained its equity, global brand ranking and classic appeal, developing a fragrance and grooming selection of products that embody classic masculinity and transcendent sophistication.
hits.ingredients: Grapefruit, Elemi, Mastic or Lentisque,Cognac, Juniper Wood, Leather,Tonka Bean, Vetiver, Incense

hits.name: Khadi Natural Herbal Orange Lemongrass Hair Conditioner - 210 ml
hits.description:
Description

This hair conditioner will revitalize and strengthen your hair, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking. Its formula works effectively to provide an overall solution to your hair and reduce frizziness, leaving it shiny and protected against the harsh environmental factors.

How to use:

After shampooing apply on entire hair length especially at the edges. Wait for a few minutes. Rinse thoroughly.

Benefits:

Revitalizes hair. Reduces frizziness. Protects against environmental damage.

Why you will love it:

It provides a solution to hair problems. It revitalizes, strengthens and provides shine to your hair.

About the brand:

Khadi Natural Healthcare is leading manufacturer, exporter and supplier for products in total 18 states and 35 authorized distributors in all over India. The Health Care products is exporting all around the world's 25 Countries with above 50 authorized seller and distributors.
hits.short_name: Herbal Orange Lemongrass Hair Conditioner - 210 ml
hits.ingredients: Purified Water, Aloe Vera Ext (Aloe Barbadensis), Wheat Germ Oil (Triticum Vulgare), Mulethi (Glycyrrhiza Glabra), Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis), Ajwain (Trachyspermum Ammi), Madhu (Honey), Almond Oil (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis), Apple Ext (Pyrus Malus

hits.name: The Finest Oud
hits.description:
Description:

“Warm, deep and rich"

A fragrant blend with endless creativity! Rich in its luxurious oriental Oud, deep thanks to its amber and musky notes, and warm with its woody notes, cashmere, and guaiac. This distinctive aromatic fragrance will not leave your side, as it lasts for long hours, and brings out a harmonious & beautiful Oud scent.

About the brand:

Discover this collection of charming & velvety oriental perfumes "The Finest". A luxurious set characterized by its elegance & charm, introducing the most endearing Arabic notes in its essence. “The Finest” offers a new take on Oriental fragrances, revealing its uniqueness through its main 3 fragrances: Oud, Rose & Amber.
hits.ingredients: Pink Pepper, Oudy Notes, White Musk

ingredients.value: Pink Pepper, Oudy Notes, White Musk

description.value:
Description:

“Warm, deep and rich"

A fragrant blend with endless creativity! Rich in its luxurious oriental Oud, deep thanks to its amber and musky notes, and warm with its woody notes, cashmere, and guaiac. This distinctive aromatic fragrance will not leave your side, as it lasts for long hours, and brings out a harmonious & beautiful Oud scent.

About the brand:

Discover this collection of charming & velvety oriental perfumes "The Finest". A luxurious set characterized by its elegance & charm, introducing the most endearing Arabic notes in its essence. “The Finest” offers a new take on Oriental fragrances, revealing its uniqueness through its main 3 fragrances: Oud, Rose & Amber.

This distinctive fragrance will not leave your side, as it lasts for long hours, and brings out a harmonious & beautiful Amber scent.

hits.name: Love Beauty And Planet Coconut Water & Mimosa Flower Shampoo - 400 ml
hits.description:
Description

Turn up the volume of Love Beauty & Planet Shampoo Coconut Water & Mimosa Flower since it builds bounce into your hair. The formula is often known as “dew from the heavens”, thanks to the coconut water that leaves your hair in a powerful and rich experience along with the unique undertones of green floral notes. Don’t stop with gorgeous glossy strands! Not to mention the delightful mimosa flower absolute that helps replenish and seal moisture into your locks, leaving them full of bounce and vitality. This conditioner is infused with ethically sourced Moroccan mimosa flower absolute to exude a breath-taking scent with creamy, exotic woody notes.

How to use:

Squeeze a small amount, massage it onto your scalp till it lathers, then rinse it off.

Benefits:

Adds volume to the hair strands and seals moisture into them

Why you will love it:

The shampoo builds bounce and brings vitality to the hair in a powerful and rich experience of coconut water along with the unique undertones of green floral notes.

About the brand:

Love Beauty and Planet brand has launched by a group of like-minded people who were enthusiastic about the personal care products and decided to grant a little love to the planet. The brand is owned by Unilever, the British multinational consumer goods firm that is regarded as the parent company of other drugstore mega-brands as well. The brand targets high-quality ingredients in their beauty products as it uses ethically sourced fragrances in the products, in addition to being vegan and cruelty-free.
hits.short_name: Coconut Water & Mimosa Flower Shampoo - 400 ml
hits.ingredients: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Perfume, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, PPG-9, Disodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-10, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Acacia Decurrens Flower Extract

hits.name: Love Beauty And Planet Tea Tree Oil & Vetiver Shampoo - 400 ml
hits.description:
Description

Love Beauty & Planet Shampoo Tea Tree Oil & Vetiver delivers the most thrilling hair experience and leaves you smiling ear to ear. The shampoo rejuvenates and refreshes lackluster hair and enhances the natural movement, thanks to its detoxifying properties. This shampoo features a volumizing cocktail for luxurious bountiful hair that feel clean and alive. This heavenly shampoo is infused with organic rosemary to stimulate hair growth after deep cleansing. Not to mention the sultry scent of vetiver that encapsulates the hair with an energizing woody fragrance, leaving a healthy glossy look.

How to use:

Squeeze a small amount, massage it onto your scalp till it lathers, then rinse it off.

Benefits:

Rejuvenates and refreshes lackluster hair after detoxifying it and buff the dead cells away.

Why you will love it:

The shampoo detoxifies the dead cells and refreshes the dull hair, leaving the hair feel clean and bountiful.

About the brand:

Love Beauty and Planet brand has launched by a group of like-minded people who were enthusiastic about the personal care products and decided to grant a little love to the planet. The brand is owned by Unilever, the British multinational consumer goods firm that is regarded as the parent company of other drugstore mega-brands as well. The brand targets high-quality ingredients in their beauty products as it uses ethically sourced fragrances in the products, in addition to being vegan and cruelty-free.
